title: Are there metal detectors for finding gold? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes there are metal detectors that are specifically designed to find natural metal alloys that are very high in gold content; often called nuggets and flakes. Often they can find isolated very tiny nuggets or flakes at depths that that less specialized detectors will miss. One of the best know manufacturers is a company called Minelab. Its current high end Gold hunting machine is about $8000 on Amazon. Dedicated or specialized gold detectors are optimized to find Gold. The typically sell from about $700 to $8000 or more. High purity gold behaves more like iron than it does like like copper or silver when exposed to electromagnetic radiation . Thus dedicated gold machine are not the best choice if you are looking for silver coins or an all around machine. Generally speaking serious all around metal detectors start at about $500 USD and go to more than $3000 USD. An all around use $500 machine will find some natural gold nuggets. Machines that cost $1500 and $3000 will have more features and likely find more natural gold. However, if you are seriously going to try to make a living hunting for placer gold the best dedicated gold machine that you can buy will likely be a wise investment.
